text: Hagi ana kini ne'mo'ma vahe'ma ha' ome huzmanteno hankave vihuma hu'nesnaza kuma'ma erinaku'ma hanuno'a eme azama hanigeno ha'ma hanigura ru vahe'mokizmi anumzantaminku kea hugahie. Ana nehuno agri kema antahisaza vahera, zamazeri ante ama' huno rankva zamazeri o'netino, mopa refko huno zagore atresige'za miza hugahaze.
